name: Space Cat ( FULL GAME )
description:
FULL GAME IS RELEASED! thank you for your kindness by helping me: kawairu pawzzie 
if the game is not working please leave a comment down below and ill be sure to try and help you on whats wrong.
original space cat demo is for web browser if you didn't play the demo then please do so you can understand the full game.
this game is 3.45 $ if you do not wan to play the full game that's perfectly okay!
please follow my development friends who help me with the games and help me with translating English specifically.
The Game is only for windows and Linux me and my friends could not do mac book for this game. i am highly sorry for that
i will try developing a game that's for all devices but meanwhile not now.
If you like our games please follow us and comment ! thank you kawairu and pawzzie for supporting and helping me develop my games!
disclaimer: we will make a Japanese game for all Japanese users but we are! but it is currently still in developing.
